sentence.Network_en: Objective To provide the evidence of identification for correctly using the Chinese herb Melastoma candidum D.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的通过对野牡丹全草进行生药学的研究,为正确用药提供鉴别依据.

sentence.Network_en: Callus was induced from stem segment and leaf from test - tube plantlet of Melastoma malabathricum Linn.
sentence.Network_cn: 以试管苗茎段、叶片为材料,探讨了印度野牡丹愈伤组织诱导及植株再生的方法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 如野牡丹属(Melastoma)雄蕊10, 花药长, 顶孔开裂, 其中5枚较大, 药隔下延成一个末端2 裂的弯曲的附属体(陈介, 1984; Gross & Kukuk.

list.abs: ...黑口鳓（学名：Ilisha melastoma），又名短鳓、印度鳓、圆眼仔，为锯腹鳓科鳓属下的一个种。== 参考文献 ==refbegin* TaiBNET| zh=黑口鳓 | id=380987 | binomial=Ilisha melastoma.
...印度鳓（学名：Ilisha melastoma）为鲱科鳓属的鱼类。分布于非洲东岸、印度、马来亚、泰国、越南、印度尼西亚、台湾岛以及南海、东海等海域。该物种的模式产地在Vizagapatam。== 参考文献 ==<.
separation of phenols from melastoma dodecandrum with macroporous resins ., 大孔吸附树脂分离地菍总酚的研究.
analysis of nutritional components of wild plant melastoma candidum ., 野生植物野牡丹营养成分分析.
...野牡丹棒粉虱（学名：Aleuroclava melastomae）为粉虱科棒粉虱属下的一个种。== 参考文献 ==refbegin* TaiBNET| zh=野牡丹棒粉虱 | id=339622 | binomial=Aleuroclava melastomae | authority=Takahashi.

means.word_mean: 1. type genus of Melastomataceae; Asiatic shrubs with leathery leaves and large purple flowers followed by edible fleshy black berries
